summary: 1K retexture for spell scrolls. Two versions available: with or without glow effect.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4][center][b]This mod is released ONLY on Nexus. If you see it on other pages, it's probably stolen.
[/b]

[youtube]UDa7xlUFdiM[/youtube]

[color=#ffffff][size=3]Mod requested by Sonja
[/size][/color][/center][/size][/color][color=#00ff00][size=3]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/color]
[size=3]The mod is a simple 1K retexture for vanilla scrolls. It also has available versions with plugins, which add pulsing glowing and imprint effect or only imprint effect to the scrolls. [size=3]Plugin versions rebalance scrolls' weight[/size]. There are two variants of textures: plain texture or texture with text. You can choose which one you prefer. I made the scrolls slightly smaller too, because I felt vanilla ones were a little bit big. I hope you like it.

Patches for [b][u]Requiem[/u][/b] and[b][u] Apocalypse - Magic of Skyri[/u][u]m v9.16[/u][/b] included.[/size]

[size=3][color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION:[/color]
Fomod installer is included in both main files. For manual installation:[/size]
[list]
[*] [size=2]retexture only - copy files from '00meshes' to your Data folder, then copy files from either '01no text' or '01text' folder, depending on what texture you want to use[/size]
[*][size=2]full version - copy files from '00required' to your Data folder, go to '01options' folder and choose which version you want to use. Copy files from '01main' and either '01no text' or '01text' to your Data folder. Copy patches you need from '02patches' to Data folder as well. Overwrite files if asked.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Full version of the mod is [color=#ff7700][b]NOT COMPATIBLE[/b][/color] with anything that alters scrolls.

If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first. [/size]
author: dailyplanet
